short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this is a chrome extension to find your own product listing on meesho.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a convenient button next to your product listings on the Meesho supplier portal. With a single click, you can view your product's live listing on Meesho.com. This helps you easily check product details, pricing, and presentation on the customer-facing platform.
